Class Data

extends java.lang.Object

      • add_item

        static void add_item(java.lang.String title,
                     java.lang.String description,
                     java.lang.String stock)
              throws NoTitleException,
                     java.lang.NumberFormatException,
                     java.sql.SQLException
        Convenience method for adding a new item to the items table
        Parameters:
        title - String title of the item
        description - String description of the item
        stock - String number of items in stock
        Throws:
        noTitleException - when the title is empty
        java.lang.NumberFormatException - when the stock amount entered is not a number
        java.sql.SQLException - for critical system errors
        NoTitleException

                 throws NoTitleException,
                        java.lang.NumberFormatException,
                        java.sql.SQLException
        Convenience method for updating an existing item
        Parameters:
        ID - String ID of the item to be updated
        title - String title of the item
        description - String description of the item
        stock - String number of items in stick
        Throws:
        NoTitleException - when the title is empty
        java.lang.NumberFormatException - when the stock amount entered is not a number
        java.sql.SQLException - for critical system errors

        Throws:
        java.lang.NumberFormatException - when one of the amounts entered for one of the purchases is not a number
